review: I received Amazon Fire TV for Christmas, and it was definitely my favorite gift! I love all of the choices (i.e.: their app selection - Netflix, HBOGO, Hulu, etc.), and it's really easy to use. If you are an Amazon Prime member, it's really a no-brainer purchase! Not only can you easily connect to your Prime Movies, but you can also access you music, photos, etc. The box is small & sleek too, so it can fit in any space. I would highly recommend!

review: I received this as a Christmas gift and boy was I excited to hook it up and use it. Setup couldn't have been simpler and within 5 min I was loading my favorite apps such as Netflix and Hulu plus. It loads everything almost instantaneously and performs flawlessly.  I love the sleek design of the actual unit and the rubber backing on the remote feels nice in my hands.  Voice search is very impressive. It always understands what I am searching for.  The only thing I wish, is that I could mirror my kindle fire hd with it, I don't have the latest hdx model which is what the fire tv was really designed to be compatible with. Overall fantastic unit. I am thinking of purchasing a second one for my living room, as I have this one set up in my bedroom.  Great job Amazon!
